entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain later this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain with freezing rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
